entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
